Name: Coolbit
About the game: Coolbit is a endless synthwave color match game. Designed for synthwave lovers that want to enjoy cool music or just pastime. Can you beat your record by surviving for most time? Give it a try and enjoy the music! This is our first game and we definitely want to improve on our future ones. With the earnings of this game we hope to be able to make original soundtracks and create even more fun through new challanges and game modes. We highly appreciate your support on this journey!
